summary: Implements an image-only augmentation that randomly selects a subset of channels in an image and replaces their pixel values with a constant fill value. The number of channels to drop is drawn from a configurable range and the operation respects a probability parameter, with schema validation ensuring compatibility with the image dimensions.
business_intent: Enhance training data diversity for computer vision models by simulating missing or corrupted color channels, thereby improving model robustness and generalization.
